tool_description: Temporary Email service that allows users to create and manage temporary email addresses for receiving messages without revealing their personal email.

api_list.name: Fetch Messages
api_list.description: Fetches messages received at the specified temporary email address.

required_parameters.name: mail
required_parameters.description: The temporary email address from which to fetch messages.

api_list.name: Create Email
api_list.description: Creates a new temporary email address.

required_parameters.name: mail
required_parameters.description: The desired temporary email address to create.

api_list.name: List Domains
api_list.description: Lists all available domains for creating temporary email addresses.
